titleStmt.title: A Short relation concerning the life and death of that man of God, and faithful minister of Jesus Christ, William Simpson, who laid down his body in the island of Barbadoes the eight day of the twelfth month, M DC LXX
titleStmt.author: Fortescue, William.
Hooton, Oliver.
Fox, George, 1624-1691.
Hooton, Elizabeth, ca. 1600-1672.
Simpson, William, 1627?-1671. Going naked a signe.

notesStmt.note: Sections written and signed by Fortescue, Oliver Hooton, George Fox, and Elizabeth Hooton.
"Going naked a signe / William Simpson": p. 14-15.
Probable place of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
